title: Ticket #1455: DAGMan job doesn't send email on Windows
description:
(See the "Single email notification after completion of DAG" thread on condor-users:

On Tue, 15 Jun 2010, Greg.Hitchen@csiro.au wrote:

> I assumed this also from reading the manuals but it is not true for us. > This is running on WindowsXP with both versions 7.2.4 and 7.4.2. > No email notification comes from the dagman.exe itself (that is executing > as a condor job). I even tried manually inserting the notification = whatever > statement into the submit file created by the dagman but to no avail. > Are you, or others, able to reproduce this behaviour?

Note: I'm not assigning this to the DAGMan subsystem, because unless something totally weird is going on, it's not really a DAGMan problem -- my guess is that any scheduler universe job on Windows will have the same problem.
remarks:
2010-Sep-02 09:30:34 by wenger:
Hmm -- Dimitri at BMRB just ran into a similar problem, so this may not be a Windows-only thing.
